sect2.title: Re-installation of Binutils
sect2.para: The current version of Binutils in use has a bug that causes strip to remove necessary information from certain library files. This patch fixes the problem:
Create a separate build directory again:
Except for a few known failures, the binutils tests should all pass. The exceptions to this rule are as follows:

screen.computeroutput: * 5 FAIL (unexpected failure) for visibility * 1 FAIL for selective4 * 1 FAIL for selective5

sect2.para: Now prepare the linker for the Re-adjusting phase in the next chapter:

screen.userinput: make -C ld clean make -C ld LIB_PATH=/usr/lib:/lib

warning.para: Do not yet remove the Binutils source and build directories. You will need these directories again in the next chapter in the state they are in now.
